title: How do I delete a blog entry entirely?
content:
I'm new at this.

How do I delete a blog entry entirely?
author: Chris Dean

comments.content:
Hey, Christopher.

1. Click on the entry's title.

2. Just beneath the entry's title, in the black bar, click on "Edit".

3. At the bottom of your entry, you will now see three buttons: the one on the far right is "Delete".

4. Once you hit the "Delete" button, that should be it, but I've never used this feature before. :-)
